name: Dusknoir
author: Suwama Chiaki
flavor_text: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.

abilities.name: Shadow Void
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pain Pellets
attacks.effect: Put damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon equal to the number of damage counters on this Pokémon.
